layer at (0,0) size 800x600
  RenderView at (0,0) size 800x600
layer at (0,0) size 800x176
  RenderBlock {html} at (0,0) size 800x176
    RenderBody {body} at (8,16) size 784x144
      RenderBlock {div} at (0,0) size 784x144
        RenderBlock {p} at (0,0) size 784x16
          RenderText {#text} at (0,0) size 225x16
            text run at (0,0) width 225: "This paragraph should be unstyled."
        RenderBlock {p} at (0,32) size 784x16 [bgcolor=#00FF00]
          RenderText {#text} at (0,0) size 293x16
            text run at (0,0) width 293: "But this one should have a green background."
        RenderBlock {p} at (0,64) size 784x16 [bgcolor=#00FF00]
          RenderText {#text} at (0,0) size 327x16
            text run at (0,0) width 327: "And this one should also have a green background."

          RenderText {#text} at (0,0) size 442x16
            text run at (0,0) width 442: "This address is only here to fill some space between two paragraphs."
        RenderBlock {p} at (0,128) size 784x16
          RenderText {#text} at (0,0) size 225x16
